Package teapot_rocket.components.inner

Class ManoeuveringEngine

java.lang.Object
teapot_rocket.components.Component
teapot_rocket.components.inner.InnerComponent
teapot_rocket.components.inner.ManoeuveringEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
MotorMount, Physical
public final class ManoeuveringEngine extends InnerComponent implements MotorMount
Represents an manoeuvering engine component used in rocket construction.

This class extends InnerComponent and implements the MotorMount interface. It represents a rocket engine component located in rocket's head.

The manoeuvering engine can calculate its movement vector based on velocity and direction. It provides methods to set and retrieve the velocity of the engine.

To create an manoeuvering engine, specify its base information and wall thickness. The velocity of the engine can be adjusted using the setVelocity(double) method during the flight.

See Also:
